response.overview: Underground profiler Giulia has learned to see through people—until her latest target, Elias, awakens a long-suppressed memory of her great love. In an elegant bar, she engages him in conversation, without revealing who she really is. The encounter turns into a dangerous game of observation and desire, where reality and memory become increasingly blurred—until Giulia begins to wonder whether Elias is a stranger… or the man she believed she had lost long ago.
response.tagline: Love never dies. It haunts you.
response.title: Chasing Ghosts

titles.title: Chasing Ghosts – A Red Box Story
